FuncDef: The display mpls te tunnel locked-path command displays locked path attributes of a TE tunnel on a local node.
CLIs: display mpls te tunnel locked-path [ tunnel-name <tunnel-name> ] [ lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <session-id> <egress-lsr-id> <local-lsp-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tunnel name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ingress LSR ID of a tunnel.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the session ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the egress LSR ID of a tunnel.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the local LSP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: To check locked path attributes of a TE tunnel on a local node, run the display mpls te tunnel locked-path command. The command output helps locate faults.
